name: Benny Run!!
description:
To celebrate this easter, I made a small endless runner called "Benny Run!!".

I made small easter animation I did back in 2019, where I first showed off Benny the Easter Bunny, Teddy's cousin who smites his foes with his Carrotbolg, or shit easter eggs at em.

Now, he has to pick up all the eggs he shat out in Benny Run!!😅

Controls:

  • Z - Attack
  • X - Jump

*Please note that this is a one-time for fun only game made for Easter. Any bugs or glitches found in the game may no longer be fixed.*
